allow_as_in.description: Permit number of advertised prefixes containing duplicate ASNs into the routing domain

maximum_routes.description: Maximum number of routes accepted from neighbor

update_source.description: Specify source interface for BGP neighbor TCP connection

maximum_paths.description: ECMP - control the maximum number of parallel eBGP routes that the device supports

announce_slack.description: Announce to slack channel change id start/stop

dst_ipv4_address.description: ip address to forward DHCP packets

port.description: Port/Interface to apply dhcp helper configuration

src_ipv4_address.description: source ip address to use on switch

src_vrf.description: source VRF to use on switch

preserve_existing_records.description: if name has existing records, preserve instead of replace

address.description: Host IP address for BGP session

device_address.description: Device IP address for BGP session

external_addresses.description: Array of IPv4 or IPv6 addresses

post.description: Dispatch real time bulk Device scan
Dispatch real time LLDP neighbor scan
Dispatch real time OSPF neighbor scan
